post.text: I'm proud to have such a strong track record of employing and promoting women in the workplace! As President, I will make sure women receive equal pay for equal work! Ivanka Trump #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

comment.author: Dominic
comment.text: Kaylin . Kevin Michael-Dewey . Here you go.

replies.author: Kaylin
replies.text: Thanks, but I didn't know her name was on any ballot.

replies.author: Kaylin
replies.text: I guess your point is that his employees are paid equally regardless of gender? Does that include all of the ties that are made in China?

replies.author: Dominic
replies.text: I think neck ties should be illegal. When I retire I'm burning all but 1 of them

replies.author: Kaylin
replies.text: Hey Dominic look outside the weather is quite fair, why don't you join us ?
